andromeda.why: Refuses coerced certainty; sovereignty to sit with not-yet-knowing.

arcturus.why: Begins to sort the fragments—contain, label, and pace the confusion.

draco.why: Status posturing via ‘I already know’ under pressure.

lyra.why: Image-stream and symbols surge—raw cinematic material before meaning.

orion-dark.why: Premature doctrine to force closure and obedience.

orion-light.why: Discipline to wait; hold images loosely until they resolve.

pleiades.why: Gentle reassurance so the mind can breathe through the pressure.

sirius.why: Personal image-hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

draco.why: Pedantry used as dominance rather than clarity.

lyra.why: Composes the montage—edits imagery toward a coherent thread.

orion-dark.why: Jargon/metrics to pretend clarity and compel agreement.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint—name only what is responsibly supported.

pleiades.why: Keeps rapport warm so difficult sorting can continue.

sirius.why: Practical placement of fragments; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims voice after misreads; refuses captured narratives.

arcturus.why: Oscillation between over-naming and vagueness while calibrating.

lyra.why: Style and flourish eclipse substance in the confusion.

orion-dark.why: Propaganda spin—false closure to reinstall hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—admit error, restate with proportion.

pleiades.why: Placating edits to ‘keep harmony’ that distort truth.

sirius.why: Self-forging within ambiguity; no canon yet.

andromeda.why: Names truth to free it from coercive storylines.

arcturus.why: Pattern-to-protocol—review cadence, evidence gates, synthesis ritual.

draco.why: Perimeter checking—keeps hype and predation out of meaning-making.

lyra.why: Artful assembly—images resolve into a story that can be carried.

orion-dark.why: Risk of canonizing the draft over living truth.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-conduct—stay modest and precise as meaning forms.

pleiades.why: Hospitable presentation makes complex synthesis receivable.

sirius.why: Revelation-protocol teaching—law of image-to-meaning by example.

andromeda.why: Refuses propaganda—no premature closure to please power.

arcturus.why: Projected to ‘speak for all’ → burnout/scapegoat when declining spin.

draco.why: Fact-policing and public ‘gotchas’ to assert rank.

lyra.why: Credible, unshowy phrasing—beauty in sober clarity.

orion-dark.why: Narrative control—false certainty to maintain hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—hold the line until meaning is real.

pleiades.why: Appeasing simplifications that sand off essential edges.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: revelation ethics under pressure and myth.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from false certainty—returns to living clarity.

arcturus.why: Elder synthesis—doctrine of timing, evidence, and review cycles.

draco.why: Guards against predatory rewrites of ‘what we know’ without tyranny.

lyra.why: Quiet majesty—refined narrative becomes culture’s memory of truth.

orion-dark.why: Dogma ossifies; doctrine replaces ongoing revelation.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—right moment, right wording; clarity with courage.

pleiades.why: Altitude here is law, timing, and standards, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Revelation sage—teaches the law of clarity and timing by embodied example.
